<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Whether to use the cost heuristic to make choices as we &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;to on, and if turned off, we will use the node order -- &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The PipelineSolver is used to assign SUnits to SchedGroups in a pipeline</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in non-trivial cases. For example, if the requested pipeline is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#123;VMEM&#95;READ, VALU, MFMA, VMEM&#95;READ&#125; and we encounter a VMEM&#95;READ instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in the DAG, then we will have an instruction that can not be trivially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// assigned to a SchedGroup. The PipelineSolver class implements two algorithms</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to find a good solution to the pipeline -- a greedy algorithm and an exact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// algorithm. The exact algorithm has an exponential time complexity and should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// only be used for small sized problems or medium sized problems where an exact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// solution is highly desired.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/pipelinesolver/#a2e443cb2a79734118f0b9a4f8ac5847e">PipelineSolver</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#91;&#91;maybe&#95;unused&#93;&#93; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scheduledagmi">ScheduleDAGMI</a> &#42;DAG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Instructions that can be assigned to multiple SchedGroups</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, SUnitsToCandidateSGsMap&gt;</a> SyncedInstrs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SUsToCandSGsVec, 4&gt;</a> PipelineInstrs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;int, SmallVector&lt;SchedGroup, 4&gt;</a>&gt; SyncedSchedGroups;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The current working pipeline</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pipeline that has the best solution found so far</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;SmallVector&lt;SchedGroup, 4&gt;</a>, 4&gt; BestPipeline;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whether or not we actually have any SyncedInstrs to try to solve.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NeedsSolver = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PipelineSolver::addEdges(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;SchedGroup&gt;</a> &amp;SyncPipeline, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SGID,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;SUnit &#42;, SUnit &#42;&gt;&gt; &amp;AddedEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For IsBottomUp, the first SchedGroup in SyncPipeline contains the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions that are the ultimate successors in the resultant mutation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore, in such a configuration, the SchedGroups occurring before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// candidate SGID are successors of the candidate SchedGroup, thus the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SU should be linked as a predecessor to SUs in those SchedGroups. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// opposite is true if !IsBottomUp. IsBottomUp occurs in the case of multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIERS, or if a user specifies IGLP&#95;OPT SchedGroups using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// IsBottomUp (in reverse).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsBottomUp ? linkSUnit(SU, SGID, AddedEdges, SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a23aab542398091e1fcfd46b6006d64ac">rbegin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad696953257cf1c4e5bd12d02146e7287">rend</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    : linkSUnit(SU, SGID, AddedEdges, SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a2fdb10193ae65fe59b4d8df288044864">begin</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                SyncPipeline.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a64ac61287490361f2183faf1d7639ee9">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AddedCost = addEdges(SyncPipeline, CurrSU.first, CandSGID, AddedEdges);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cost of Assignment: &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; AddedCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++BranchesExplored;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FinishedExploring = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the Cost after adding edges is greater than a known solution,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backtrack</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurrCost &lt; BestCost || BestCost == -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!FinishedExploring)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    retreatPosition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrCost -= AddedCost;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">    removeEdges(AddedEdges);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a313a633eb3049b90e931206183e1251ea6da89265a9a8b0b28eb4946bb2ec0c6d">Match</a>-&gt;pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurrPipeline&#91;CurrSyncGroupIdx&#93; = SyncPipeline;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FinishedExploring)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try the pipeline where the current instruction is omitted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Potentially if we omit a problematic instruction from the pipeline,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// all the other instructions can nicely fit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CurrCost += MissPenalty;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(CurrSyncGroupIdx) &lt; PipelineInstrs.size()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ProblemSize &gt; 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BelowCutoff = (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#acab046bda7f0f74be13237edcecbf3f0">CutoffForExact</a> &gt; 0) &amp;&amp; ProblemSize &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#acab046bda7f0f74be13237edcecbf3f0">CutoffForExact</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MissPenalty = (ProblemSize / 2) + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(DAG-&gt;dump());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a8a0d07896440f2bef06041669fe114bc">EnableExactSolver</a> || BelowCutoff) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Starting Greedy pipeline solver\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlight">    solveGreedy();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">    reset();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Greedy produced best cost of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; BestCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestCost &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Starting EXACT pipeline solver\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">      solveExact();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Exact produced best cost of &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; BestCost &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use the Greedy Algorithm by default</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Starting GREEDY pipeline solver\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    solveGreedy();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PHASE 2: Main Interleave Loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of MFMAs per iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MFMARatio =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MFMAEnablement &gt; ExpRequirement ? MFMAEnablement / ExpRequirement : 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1712"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The number of Exps per iteration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpRatio =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MFMAEnablement &gt; ExpRequirement ? 1 : ExpRequirement / MFMAEnablement;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The reamaining Exps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RemainingExp = TransPipeCount &gt; (2 &#42; ExpRequirement)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1717"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              ? TransPipeCount - (2 &#42; ExpRequirement)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1718"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1719"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpLoopCount = RemainingExp / ExpRatio;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In loop MFMAs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1721"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MFMAInLoop = MFMAPipeCount &gt; (MFMAEnablement &#42; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1722"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            ? MFMAPipeCount - (MFMAEnablement &#42; 2)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1723"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MFMALoopCount = MFMAInLoop / MFMARatio;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VALUOps =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1726"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AddPipeCount &lt; MFMAPipeCount ? 1 : AddPipeCount / MFMAPipeCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopSize = std::min(ExpLoopCount, MFMALoopCount);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1728"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; LoopSize; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &#42; ExpRatio % ExpRequirement))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      incrementTransPosition();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Round N MFMA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SG = &amp;SyncedSchedGroups&#91;PipelineSyncID&#93;.emplace&#95;back(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1735"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345fafad0f3826ff232c44b55c89c333e115a">SchedGroupMask::MFMA</a>, MFMARatio, PipelineSyncID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/iglpstrategy/#aa732d05ffff7be6cbcdcc3895d2524c8">DAG</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/iglpstrategy/#a787d4f8409dfc44376a67ab93559b671">TII</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IsPostRA &amp;&amp; MFMAChains)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1737"><span class="doxyHighlight">      SG-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/schedgroup/#aac3fdb37ad3151631a0ac14614e11a53">addRule</a>(std::make&#95;shared&lt;IsExactMFMA&gt;(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use a SCHED&#95;BARRIER&#39;s mask to identify instruction SchedGroups that should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not be reordered accross the SCHED&#95;BARRIER. This is used for the base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SCHED&#95;BARRIER, and not SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER. The difference is that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SCHED&#95;BARRIER will always block all instructions that can be classified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into a particular SchedClass, whereas SCHED&#95;GROUP&#95;BARRIER has a fixed size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and may only synchronize with some SchedGroups. Returns the inverse of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask. SCHED&#95;BARRIER&#39;s mask describes which instruction types should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allowed to be scheduled across it. Invert the mask to get the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SchedGroupMask of instructions that should be barred.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345f">SchedGroupMask</a> invertSchedBarrierMask(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-amdgpuigrouplp-cpp-/#a09279cda31d6b1b9fb748d7f45d1345f">SchedGroupMask</a> Mask) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
